properties.areaDesc: Campbell, VA; Charlotte, VA; Halifax, VA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 1:59PM EST until February 8 at 8:42AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service Blacksburg Va has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Virginia...

Roanoke River At Roanoke affecting City of Roanoke...City of Salem
and Roanoke Counties

...Flooding Continues Along the Roanoke River and its tributaries at the Following Locations...

Pigg River Near Pigg R Near Sandy Level affecting Pittsylvania County

Roanoke (Staunton) River At Brookneal affecting Campbell...Charlotte and Halifax Counties

Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and
Halifax Counties

Several inches of rain fell across the region yesterday into
this morning. Excessive runoff continues across the region
resulting in minor to moderate flooding along the Roanoke
River and its tributaries.

* until Saturday morning.
* At 1 PM EST this afternoon the stage was 26.0 feet...and falling.
* Flood Stage is 23.0 feet. Moderate flood stage is 27.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast to
continue.
* The river is forecast to fall below flood stage Saturday morning.
* Impact...at 28.0 feet...Brookneal Fish Hatchery pond furthest
downstream begins to flood.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 25.7
feet on Feb 24 2019.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Listen to NOAA weather radio or your favorite media outlet for later
statements or warnings.
